main event: A bright light was observed moving in a straight line and disappearing after approximately 50 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen at an altitude of 200 feet and 2.5 miles away., The light settled behind a hill within a quarter-mile distance., The observation lasted for about 20 seconds., The weather was partially overcast with good visibility., No other aircraft were reported in the vicinity during the sighting.
witness description: A 26-year-old observer from the Pennington County Sheriff's Office.
